record.title: ORDER OF PROCEDURE

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, I see my friend from Ohio is in the Chamber. Does the Senator from Ohio wish to be recognized?
Mr. President, yes, I do. I wish to be recognized for 10 minutes as part of morning business.

Mr. President, we have no morning business. The Senator can proceed as in morning business if he asks. We are not going to have morning business. I say to the Senator, my understanding is you want 10 or 15 minutes to speak as in morning business.
Yes, Mr. President, I do. I ask unanimous consent to speak for 10 minutes as in morning business.

record.chair: Without objection, it is so ordered.
The senior Senator from Ohio is recognized for 10 minutes.
